type.description: The type of sparklines to create, in this case it would be `'area'`.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data. This will only be used if the data array contains objects with key-value pairs.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data. This will only be used if the data array contains objects with key-value pairs.

padding.description: Configuration for the padding in pixels shown around the sparklines.

axis.description: The options for the horizontal axis line in the sparklines.

fill.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the area.

marker.description: The configuration for the marker styles.

highlightStyle.description: The configuration for the highlighting used when the markers are hovered over.

top.description: The number of pixels of padding at the top of the sparkline area.

right.description: The number of pixels of padding at the right of the sparkline area.

bottom.description: The number of pixels of padding at the bottom of the sparkline area.

left.description: The number of pixels of padding at the left of the sparkline area.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the horizontal axis line.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the horizontal axis line.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the line.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the line.

enabled.description: By default this is set to `true` whilst marker size is set to `0`, which means the markers are present but not visible.

size.description: The width in pixels of markers. By default this is `0`, increase the size to make markers visible.

fill.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the markers.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the markers.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the markers.

formatter.description: A callback function to return format styles for individual markers.

size.description: The width in pixels of the markers when hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over. Use `undefined` for no highlight fill.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the markers when hovered over. Use `undefined` for no highlight stroke.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the markers when hovered over.

enabled.description: Set to false to make marker invisible.

size.description: The width in pixels of the individual marker.

fill.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the individual marker.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the individual marker.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual marker.
